Body: On a regular basis during morning commute our signal shows actual location, then shows location in the next city 70 miles away for a few minutes, then shows actual location again. Both locations are major cities with lots of cell towers. It also showed once from our town , actual location, to this same city/ tower, then back to actual location.This always happens while on mobile smart phone. Is it caused by calls,txt, or web activity to someone in this area?
Title: location showing up 70/100 miles away

history.Text: On a regular basis during morning commute our signal shows actual location, then shows location in the next city 70 miles away for a few minutes, then shows actual location again. Both locations are major cities with lots of cell towers. It also showed once from our town , actual location, to this same city/ tower, then back to actual location.This always happens while on mobile smart phone. Is it caused by calls,txt, or web activity to someone in this area?
